name: Paracetamol 500mg
description: Paracetamol helps reduce fever and pain effectively.
uses: Used for fever, headache, and mild body pain relief.
directions: Take one tablet with water after food, or as directed by a doctor.
quickTips: Do not exceed the recommended dosage.
sideEffects: May cause nausea or drowsiness in some cases.

reviews.name: Jane Smith
reviews.comment: Good product, but delivery was slow.

name: Amoxicillin 250mg
description: Amoxicillin is an antibiotic used to treat various infections.
uses: Used for bacterial infections like strep throat, pneumonia, and ear infections.
directions: Take one capsule every 8 hours with water, or as directed by a doctor.
quickTips: Complete the full course of antibiotics as prescribed.
sideEffects: May cause diarrhea or allergic reactions in some cases.

reviews.name: Bob Martin
reviews.comment: Works great, but caused mild stomach upset.
